name: Personal Space (Jelly Machete)
description:
A personal game about a long distance relationship in space, where messages can take minutes to reach your partner.

Wait around for the next message as you fly through the cosmos, killing time with the random devices on your ship.

Play time approx. 10-15 minutes.

Made for Global Game Jam 2018, with the theme "Transmission" (reflected in the really slow transmissions between you and your partner), with the diversifier "Inception: Create a game which you can play within your game"
